actions.text: Committee on Finance. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Packwood under the authority of the order of May 21, 86. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Budget.
Committee on Budget. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Budget. Reported to Senate by Senator Domenici without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 668.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: An original resolution waiving section 303(a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of H.R. 3838 and of the Committee on Finance amendment thereto.

summary.text: Waives certain requirements of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of H.R. 3838 (Tax Reform Act of 1985) and the Senate Finance Committee amendment thereto.

titles.title: An original resolution waiving section 303(a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of H.R. 3838 and of the Committee on Finance amendment thereto.
